trans-unit.target: 对于X11平台，将自动支持以下其他类型，并解析为其内部定义：

trans-unit.source: For PixelArray assignment, if the right hand side array has a row length of 1, then the column is broadcast over the target array's rows. An array of height 1 is broadcast over the target's columns, and is equivalent to assigning a 1D PixelArray.
trans-unit.target: 对于PixelArray的赋值,如果右侧数组的行长为1,则在目标数组的行上广播该列。高度为1的数组会在目标数组的列上广播,相当于分配一个1D的PixelArray。

trans-unit.source: For a quick way to initialise the joystick module and get a list of Joystick instances use the following code:
trans-unit.target: 为了快速初始化操纵杆模块并获得操纵杆实例列表,请使用以下代码。

trans-unit.source: For a scalable font, a single number value is equivalent to a tuple with width equal height. A font can be stretched vertically with height set greater than width, or horizontally with width set greater than height. For embedded bitmaps, as listed by get_sizes(), use the nominal width and height to select an available size.
trans-unit.target: 对于可缩放字体，单个数字值等效于宽度等于高度的元组。可以将高度设置为大于宽度的垂直方向拉伸字体，或者将宽度设置为大于高度的水平方向拉伸字体。对于由 get_sizes() 列出的嵌入式位图，请使用名义宽度和高度来选择可用的大小。

trans-unit.source: For a surface with colorkey or blanket alpha, a blit to self may give slightly different colors than a non self-blit.
trans-unit.target: 对于一个带有colorkey或blanket alpha的曲面,blit to self与非self-blit的颜色可能略有不同。

trans-unit.source: For all functions the arguments are strictly positional. Only integers are accepted for coordinates and radii.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有函数的参数都是严格的位置关系。坐标和半径只接受整数。

trans-unit.source: For alpha transparency, like in .png images, use the convert_alpha() method after loading so that the image has per pixel transparency.
trans-unit.target: 对于Alpha透明度，例如在.png图像中，请在加载后使用 convert_alpha() 方法，以使图像具有每个像素的透明度。

trans-unit.source: For an aapolygon, use aalines() with closed=True.
trans-unit.target: 对于aapolygon，请使用 aalines() 与close closed=True 。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how the scrap module works refer to the examples page (pygame.examples.scrap_clipboard.main()) or the code directly in GitHub (pygame/examples/scrap_clipboard.py).
trans-unit.target: 有关 pygame.examples.scrap_clipboard.main() 模块工作方式的示例，请参考示例页面（pygame.examples.scrap_clipboard.main（））或直接在GitHub中的代码（pygame / examples / scrap_clipboard.py）。

trans-unit.source: For assignment, a tuple can only be a color. Any other sequence type is a sequence of colors.
trans-unit.target: 对于赋值,一个元组只能是一个颜色。其他任何序列类型都是颜色序列。

trans-unit.source: For each frame of your game, you will need to make some sort of call to the event queue. This ensures your program can internally interact with the rest of the operating system. If you are not using other event functions in your game, you should call pygame.event.pump() to allow pygame to handle internal actions.
trans-unit.target: 对于游戏的每一帧，您都需要对事件队列进行某种调用。这样可以确保您的程序可以与操作系统的其余部分进行内部交互。如果您没有在游戏中使用其他事件函数，则应调用 pygame.event.pump() 以允许pygame处理内部动作。

trans-unit.source: For even width values, the thickness of each line grows with the original line being offset from the center (as there is no exact center line drawn). As a result, lines with a slope < 1 (horizontal-ish) will have 1 more pixel of thickness below the original line (in the y direction). Lines with a slope >= 1 (vertical-ish) will have 1 more pixel of thickness to the right of the original line (in the x direction).
trans-unit.target: 对于均匀的 width 值，每条线的粗细都会随着原始线偏离中心而增加（因为没有绘制出精确的中心线）。结果，斜率小于1（水平方向）的线的厚度将比原始线（沿y方向）低1个像素。斜率> = 1的线（垂直ish）将在原始线的右侧（沿x方向）增加1像素的粗细。

trans-unit.source: For example, some predefined event identifiers are QUIT and MOUSEMOTION.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一些预定义的事件标识符是 QUIT 和 MOUSEMOTION 。

trans-unit.source: For example, the attributes of a KEYDOWN event would be unicode, key, and mod
trans-unit.target: 例如， KEYDOWN 事件的属性为 unicode ， key 和 mod

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: For functions like rectangle that accept a rect argument any (x, y, w, h) sequence is accepted, though pygame.Rect instances are preferred. Note that for a pygame.Rect the drawing will not include Rect.bottomright. The right and bottom attributes of a Rect lie one pixel outside of the Rect's boarder.
trans-unit.target: 对于像矩形这样的接受rect参数的函数，可以接受任何（x，y，w，h）序列，尽管首选 pygame.Rect 实例。请注意，对于 pygame.Rect ，工程图将不包含 Rect.bottomright 。Rect的right和bottom属性位于Rect边界的外面一个像素。

trans-unit.source: For now buffer and array support is consistent with sndarray.make_sound for Numeric arrays, in that sample sign and byte order are ignored. This will change, either by correctly handling sign and byte order, or by raising an exception when different. Also, source samples are truncated to fit the audio sample size. This will not change.
trans-unit.target: 现在，对于数字数组，缓冲区和数组支持与 sndarray.make_sound 一致，因为示例符号和字节顺序被忽略。这将通过正确处理符号和字节顺序或通过在不同时引发异常而改变。同样，源样本将被截断以适合音频样本的大小。这不会改变。

trans-unit.source: For now undefined character codes are replaced with the .notdef (not defined) character. How undefined codes are handled may become configurable in a future release.
trans-unit.target: 目前，未定义的字符代码已替换为 .notdef （未定义）字符。在将来的版本中，如何处理未定义的代码可能变得可配置。

trans-unit.source: For odd width values, the thickness of each line grows with the original line being in the center.
trans-unit.target: 对于奇数 width 值，每条线的粗细会随着原始线的居中而增加。

trans-unit.source: For pygame development the test suite can be run from a pygame distribution root directory. Program run_tests.py is provided for convenience, though test/go.py can be run directly.
trans-unit.target: 对于pygame开发，可以从pygame发行版根目录运行测试套件。为了方便起见，提供了 run_tests.py 程序，尽管可以直接运行test / go.py。

trans-unit.source: For the 'R', 'G', 'B', and 'A' copy kinds a single color component of the unmapped surface pixels are copied to the target 2D array. For kind 'A' and surfaces with source alpha (the surface was created with the SRCALPHA flag), has a colorkey (set with Surface.set_colorkey()), or has a blanket alpha (set with Surface.set_alpha()) then the alpha values are those expected for a SDL surface. If a surface has no explicit alpha value, then the target array is filled with the value of the optional opaque surface_to_array argument (default 255: not transparent).
trans-unit.target: 对于“ R”，“ G”，“ B”和“ A”副本类型，将未映射的表面像素的单个颜色分量复制到目标2D数组。对于类型'A'以及具有源alpha的曲面（该曲面是使用SRCALPHA标志创建的），具有一个colorkey（由 Surface.set_colorkey() 设置）或具有一个覆盖性alpha（由 Surface.set_alpha() 设置）的， alpha值是SDL表面的预期值。如果表面没有明确的Alpha值，则目标数组将填充可选的 opaque surface_to_array参数的值（默认值为255：不透明）。

trans-unit.source: Function set_pos() calls underlining SDL_mixer function Mix_SetMusicPosition.
trans-unit.target: 函数 set_pos() 会调用强调SDL_mixer函数 Mix_SetMusicPosition 的函数。

trans-unit.source: Functions to convert between NumPy arrays and Sound objects. This module will only be available when pygame can use the external NumPy package.
trans-unit.target: NumPy数组和声音对象之间的转换函数。只有当pygame可以使用外部的NumPy包时,这个模块才会被使用。

trans-unit.source: Functions to convert pixel data between pygame Surfaces and arrays. This module will only be functional when pygame can use the external NumPy package.
trans-unit.target: 在 pygame Surfaces 和数组之间转换像素数据的函数。只有当pygame可以使用外部的NumPy包时,这个模块才能发挥作用。

trans-unit.source: Get a reference to the currently set display surface
trans-unit.target: 获取当前设置的显示面的引用

trans-unit.source: Get information about the current windowing system
trans-unit.target: 获取当前窗口系统的信息

trans-unit.source: Get list of available fullscreen modes
trans-unit.target: 获取可用的全屏模式列表

trans-unit.source: Get or set the default size for text metrics and rendering. It can be a single point size, given as an Python int or float, or a font ppem (width, height) tuple. Size values are non-negative. A zero size or width represents an undefined size. In this case the size must be given as a method argument, or an exception is raised. A zero width but non-zero height is a ValueError.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本指标和渲染的默认大小。它可以是单点大小，可以是Python int 或 float ，也可以是字体ppem（宽度，高度） tuple 。大小值是非负的。零大小或宽度表示未定义的大小。在这种情况下，必须将大小作为方法参数给出，否则会引发异常。零宽度但非零高度是ValueError。

trans-unit.target: 获取当前的透明色键

trans-unit.source: Get the current visibility state of the mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前鼠标光标的可见性状态。

trans-unit.source: Get the current window caption
trans-unit.target: 获取当前窗口的标题

trans-unit.source: Get the descriptive name of the button from a keyboard button id constant.
trans-unit.target: 从键盘按钮id常量中获取按钮的描述性名称。

trans-unit.source: Get the filename of the default font
trans-unit.target: 获取默认字体的文件名

trans-unit.source: Get the information about the mouse system cursor. The return value is the same data as the arguments passed into pygame.mouse.set_cursor().
trans-unit.target: 获取有关鼠标系统光标的信息。返回值与传递给 pygame.mouse.set_cursor() 的参数相同。

trans-unit.target: 获取pygame显示后台的名称。

trans-unit.source: Get the offset position of a child subsurface inside of a parent. If the Surface is not a subsurface this will return (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: 获取子表面在父表面内的偏移位置,如果Surface不是子表面,将返回(0,0)。如果Surface不是子曲面,将返回(0,0)。

trans-unit.source: Get the offset position of a child subsurface inside of its top level parent Surface. If the Surface is not a subsurface this will return (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: 获取子表面在其顶层父表面内的偏移位置,如果Surface不是子表面,将返回(0,0)。如果Surface不是子表面,将返回(0,0)。

trans-unit.source: Get the value for an OpenGL flag for the current display
trans-unit.target: 获取当前显示器的OpenGL标志值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of data type string identifiers for the data currently available on the clipboard. Each identifier can be used in the pygame.scrap.get() method to get the clipboard content of the specific type.
trans-unit.target: 获取剪贴板上当前可用数据的数据类型字符串标识符列表。可以在 pygame.scrap.get() 方法中使用每个标识符来获取特定类型的剪贴板内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the available clipboard types.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用剪贴板类型的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets an image from a camera as a string in the native pixelformat of the camera. Useful for integration with other libraries.
trans-unit.target: 从相机中获取图像,以相机的本地像素格式作为字符串。有助于与其他库集成。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a factor which, when positive, is multiplied with the font's underline offset to adjust the underline position. A negative value turns an underline into a strike-through or overline. It is multiplied with the ascender. Accepted values range between -2.0 and 2.0 inclusive. A value of 0.5 closely matches Tango underlining. A value of 1.0 mimics pygame.font.Font underlining.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个因子，当为正数时，将其乘以字体的下划线偏移量以调整下划线位置。负值会将下划线变成删除线或上划线。它乘以升序。可接受的值介于-2.0和2.0之间（含-2.0）。值0.5非常接近Tango下划线。值1.0模仿 pygame.font.Font 下划线。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the CMY representation of the Color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颜色的CMY表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HSLA representation of the Color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颜色的HSLA表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HSVA representation of the Color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颜色的HSVA表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the I1I2I3 representation of the Color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颜色的I1I2I3表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alpha value of the Color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颜色的alpha值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the baseline angle of the rendered text. The angle is represented as integer degrees. The default angle is 0, with horizontal text rendered along the X-axis, and vertical text along the Y-axis. A positive value rotates these axes counterclockwise that many degrees. A negative angle corresponds to a clockwise rotation. The rotation value is normalized to a value within the range 0 to 359 inclusive (eg. 390 -> 390 - 360 -> 30, -45 -> 360 + -45 -> 315, 720 -> 720 - (2 * 360) -> 0).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置渲染文本的基线角度。角度表示为整数度。默认角度为0，水平文本沿X轴渲染，垂直文本沿Y轴渲染。正值将这些轴逆时针旋转许多度。负角对应于顺时针旋转。旋转值标准化为0到359之间的一个值（例如390-> 390-360-> 30，-45-> 360 + -45-> 315，720-> 720-（2 * 360） -> 0）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the blue value of the Color.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the decoding of Unicode text. By default, the freetype module performs UTF-16 surrogate pair decoding on Unicode text. This allows 32-bit escape sequences ('Uxxxxxxxx') between 0x10000 and 0x10FFFF to represent their corresponding UTF-32 code points on Python interpreters built with a UCS-2 Unicode type (on Windows, for instance). It also means character values within the UTF-16 surrogate area (0xD800 to 0xDFFF) are considered part of a surrogate pair. A malformed surrogate pair will raise a UnicodeEncodeError. Setting ucs4 True turns surrogate pair decoding off, allowing access the full UCS-4 character range to a Python interpreter built with four-byte Unicode character support.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置Unicode文本的解码。默认情况下，freetype模块对Unicode文本执行UTF-16代理对解码。这允许0x10000和0x10FFFF之间的32位转义序列（'Uxxxxxxxx'）代表使用UCS-2 Unicode类型构建的Python解释器上的相应UTF-32代码点（例如，在Windows上）。这也意味着UTF-16代理区域（0xD800至0xDFFF）内的字符值被视为代理对的一部分。格式不正确的代理对将引发UnicodeEncodeError。设置ucs4 True 可以关闭代理对解码，从而允许使用支持四字节Unicode字符的Python解释器访问完整的UCS-4字符范围。

trans-unit.source: If latency is zero, timestamps are ignored and all output is delivered immediately. If latency is greater than zero, output is delayed until the message timestamp plus the latency. In some cases, PortMidi can obtain better timing than your application by passing timestamps along to the device driver or hardware. Latency may also help you to synchronize midi data to audio data by matching midi latency to the audio buffer latency.
trans-unit.target: 如果 latency 为零，则时间戳将被忽略，所有输出将立即交付。如果 latency 大于零，则输出将延迟到消息时间戳加上 latency 为止。在某些情况下，通过将时间戳传递给设备驱动程序或硬件，P​​ortMidi可以获得比您的应用程序更好的时序。延迟还可以通过将Midi延迟与音频缓冲区延迟匹配来帮助您将Midi数据与音频数据同步。

trans-unit.source: If a background color bgcolor is given, the text bounding box is first filled with that color. The text is blitted next. Both the background fill and text rendering involve full alpha blits. That is, the alpha values of the foreground, background, and destination target surface all affect the blit.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了背景色bgcolor，则首先用该颜色填充文本边界框。接下来将文本变白。背景填充和文本渲染都涉及完整的alpha斑点。也就是说，前景，背景和目标目标表面的alpha值都会影响blit。

trans-unit.source: If a color-key is not used, then the alpha value of each pixel is used to decide which bits in the resulting mask are set. trans-unit.target: 如果未使用颜色键，则使用每个像素的alpha值来确定设置的结果掩码中的哪些位。所有具有α值的像素大于所述 threshold 参数的设定和与α值的像素小于或等于所述 threshold 未设置。

This is useful to separate the framerate of the game from that of the camera without having to use threading.

trans-unit.source: If the font file has more than one font, the font to load can be chosen with the index argument. An exception is raised for an out-of-range font index value.
trans-unit.target: 如果字体文件具有一种以上的字体，则可以使用index参数选择要加载的字体。超出范围的字体索引值引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If the mixer has reserved channels from pygame.mixer.set_reserved() then those channels will not be returned here.
trans-unit.target: 如果混音器已从 pygame.mixer.set_reserved() 保留了频道，则这些频道不会在此处返回。

trans-unit.source: If the mixer is initialized, this returns the playback arguments it is using. If the mixer has not been initialized this returns None.
trans-unit.target: 如果混音器已初始化，则返回它正在使用的播放参数。如果混音器尚未初始化，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse cursor is hidden, and input is grabbed to the current display the mouse will enter a virtual input mode, where the relative movements of the mouse will never be stopped by the borders of the screen. See the functions pygame.mouse.set_visible() and pygame.event.set_grab() to get this configured.
trans-unit.target: 如果隐藏了鼠标光标，并且输入被捕获到当前显示，则鼠标将进入虚拟输入模式，在该模式下，鼠标的相对移动将永远不会因屏幕的边界而停止。请参阅函数 pygame.mouse.set_visible() 和 pygame.event.set_grab() 进行配置。

trans-unit.source: If the once argument is True, then only send the timer once.
trans-unit.target: 如果一旦参数为True,那么只发送一次定时器。

trans-unit.source: If the optional 'search_surf' surface is given, it is used to threshold against rather than the specified 'set_color'. That is, it will find each pixel in the 'surf' that is within the 'threshold' of the pixel at the same coordinates of the 'search_surf'.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定了可选的'search_surf'表面,它被用来针对而不是指定的'set_color'进行阈值化。也就是说,它将在'surf'中找到每一个在'search_surf'相同坐标的像素的'阈值'内的像素。

trans-unit.source: If the optional othersurface is not used, all the pixels within the threshold of the color parameter are set in the resulting mask.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选 othersurface 没有被使用，所有的像素内的 threshold 的的 color 参数被设定在所得到的掩模。

trans-unit.source: If the optional othersurface is used, every pixel in the first surface that is within the threshold of the corresponding pixel in othersurface is set in the resulting mask.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选 othersurface 被使用，在该第一表面，其每一个像素内的 threshold 中的对应像素的 othersurface 是一套在所得掩模。

trans-unit.source: If the sprite collides with any single sprite in the group, a single sprite from the group is returned. On no collision None is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果精灵与群组中的任何一个精灵发生碰撞,则返回群组中的一个精灵。如果没有碰撞,则返回None。

trans-unit.source: If the sprite is not found then it will return the default layer.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有找到精灵,那么它将返回默认层。

trans-unit.source: If the sprite you add has an attribute layer then that layer will be used. If the **kwarg contains 'layer' then the sprites passed will be added to that layer (overriding the sprite.layer attribute). If neither sprite has attribute layer nor **kwarg then the default layer is used to add the sprites.
trans-unit.target: 如果添加的精灵具有属性层，则将使用该层。如果** kwarg包含“ layer”，则传递的精灵将添加到该图层（覆盖 sprite.layer 属性）。如果子画面既没有属性层也没有** kwarg，则使用默认层添加子画面。

trans-unit.source: If the surface uses a color-key, then it is used to decide which bits in the resulting mask are set. All the pixels that are not equal to the color-key are set and the pixels equal to the color-key are not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果表面使用颜色键，则用于确定结果蒙版中的哪些位已设置。所有这一切都是像素不等于色键被设定和像素等于色键未设置。

trans-unit.source: If there is no sound actively playing on the Channel then the Sound will begin playing immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果通道上没有正在播放的声音,那么声音将立即开始播放。

trans-unit.source: If too many events are made a pygame.error is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生太多事件，则会引发 pygame.error 。

trans-unit.source: If value > 1.0, the volume will be set to 1.0
trans-unit.target: 如果值> 1.0，则音量将设置为1.0

trans-unit.source: If value < 0.0, the volume will not be changed
trans-unit.target: 如果值<0.0，则不会更改音量

trans-unit.source: If you are creating your own cursor strings, you can use any value represent the black and white pixels. Some system allow you to set a special toggle color for the system color, this is also called the xor color. If the system does not support xor cursors, that color will simply be black.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是在创建自己的游标字符串,你可以使用任何值代表黑白像素。有些系统允许你为系统颜色设置一个特殊的切换颜色,这也叫xor颜色。如果系统不支持xor光标,那么该颜色将只是黑色。

trans-unit.source: If you are only taking specific events from the queue, be aware that the queue could eventually fill up with the events you are not interested.
trans-unit.target: 如果你只从队列中抽取特定的事件,请注意队列最终可能会被你不感兴趣的事件填满。

trans-unit.source: If you don't need all the features of the pygame.sprite.spritecollide() function, this function will be a bit quicker.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要 pygame.sprite.spritecollide() 函数的所有功能，则此功能会更快一些。

trans-unit.source: If you pass a start time but no end, the audio will play to the end of the track. If you pass a start time and 'None' for the end time, the audio will play to the end of the entire disc.
trans-unit.target: 如果您通过了开始时间但没有结束时间,音频将播放到轨道的结尾。如果您通过了开始时间,而结束时间为 "无",音频将播放到整个光盘的结尾。

trans-unit.source: If you pass the optional framerate argument the function will delay to keep the game running slower than the given ticks per second. This can be used to help limit the runtime speed of a game. By calling Clock.tick(40) once per frame, the program will never run at more than 40 frames per second.
trans-unit.target: 如果您传递可选的帧速率参数，该功能将延迟以使游戏的运行速度低于给定的每秒滴答声。这可以用来帮助限制游戏的运行速度。通过每帧调用 Clock.tick(40) 一次，该程序将永远不会以每秒40帧以上的速度运行。

trans-unit.source: If you pass the optional framerate argument the function will delay to keep the game running slower than the given ticks per second. This can be used to help limit the runtime speed of a game. By calling Clock.tick_busy_loop(40) once per frame, the program will never run at more than 40 frames per second.
trans-unit.target: 如果您传递可选的帧速率参数，该功能将延迟以使游戏的运行速度低于给定的每秒滴答声。这可以用来帮助限制游戏的运行速度。通过每帧调用 Clock.tick_busy_loop(40) 一次，该程序将永远不会以每秒40帧以上的速度运行。

trans-unit.source: If you render '\n' an unknown char will be rendered. Usually a rectangle. Instead you need to handle new lines yourself.
trans-unit.target: 如果你呈现'\n',一个未知的字符将被呈现。通常是一个矩形。相反,你需要自己处理新的线条。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the name, get_device_info() returns "interf", which is the interface name. The "interface" is the underlying software system or API used by PortMidi to access devices. Supported interfaces:
trans-unit.target: 除了名称之外， get_device_info() 还返回“ interf ”，这是接口名称。“接口”是PortMidi用于访问设备的基础软件系统或API。支持的接口：

trans-unit.source: In general, the registry is a better place for this kind of info. With USB devices that can come and go, using integers is not very reliable for device identification. Under Windows, if PM_RECOMMENDED_INPUT_DEVICE (or PM_RECOMMENDED_OUTPUT_DEVICE) is NOT found in the environment, then the default device is obtained by looking for a string in the registry under:
trans-unit.target: 通常，注册表是此类信息的更好场所。对于可以来来去去的USB设备，使用整数来识别设备不是很可靠。在Windows下，如果在环境中未找到 PM_RECOMMENDED_INPUT_DEVICE （或 PM_RECOMMENDED_OUTPUT_DEVICE ），则可以通过在注册表中的以下位置查找字符串来获取默认设备：

trans-unit.source: In the current release, the default is simply the first device (the input or output device with the lowest PmDeviceID).
trans-unit.target: 在当前的版本中,默认的是第一个设备(PmDeviceID最低的输入或输出设备)。

trans-unit.source: Indicates if the clipboard ownership has been lost by the pygame application.
trans-unit.target: 表示剪贴板的所有权是否已被pygame程序丢失。

trans-unit.source: Individual test modules may have a __tags__ attribute, a list of tag strings used to selectively omit modules from a run. By default only 'interactive' modules such as cdrom_test are ignored. An interactive module must be run from the console as a Python program.
trans-unit.target: 单个测试模块可以有一个 __tags__属性,这是一个标签字符串的列表,用来有选择地从运行中省略模块。默认情况下,只有 "交互式 "模块,如 cdrom_test 会被忽略。交互式模块必须作为一个 Python 程序从控制台运行。

trans-unit.source: Initialize a window or screen for display
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个窗口或屏幕的显示

trans-unit.source: Initialize all imported pygame modules. No exceptions will be raised if a module fails, but the total number if successful and failed inits will be returned as a tuple. You can always initialize individual modules manually, but pygame.init() is a convenient way to get everything started. The init() functions for individual modules will raise exceptions when they fail.
trans-unit.target: 初始化所有导入的pygame模块。如果模块失败，则不会引发任何异常，但是成功和失败初始化的总数将作为元组返回。您总是可以手动初始化各个模块，但是 pygame.init() 是开始一切的便捷方法。各个模块的 init() 函数失败时将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Initialize the cdrom drive for use. The drive must be initialized for most CD methods to work. Even if the rest of pygame has been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 初始化cdrom驱动器以供使用。必须初始化驱动器才能使大多数 CD 方法起作用。即使pygame的其余部分已经初始化。

trans-unit.source: Initialize the cdrom module. This will scan the system for all CD devices. The module must be initialized before any other functions will work. This automatically happens when you call pygame.init().
trans-unit.target: 初始化cdrom模块。这将在系统中扫描所有 CD 设备。必须先初始化该模块，然后其他功能才能起作用。这在您调用 pygame.init() 时自动发生。

trans-unit.source: Initialize the display module
trans-unit.target: 初始化显示模块

trans-unit.source: Initialize the joystick module.
trans-unit.target: 初始化操纵杆模块。

trans-unit.source: Initialize the mixer module for Sound loading and playback. The default arguments can be overridden to provide specific audio mixing. Keyword arguments are accepted. For backward compatibility where an argument is set zero the default value is used (possible changed by a pre_init call).
trans-unit.target: 初始化混音器模块,用于加载和播放声音。默认参数可以被重写,以提供特定的音频混合。可以接受关键字参数。为了向后兼容,当一个参数被设置为0时,将使用默认值(可能通过pre_init调用改变)。

trans-unit.source: Initialize the scrap module.
trans-unit.target: 初始化废品模块。

trans-unit.source: Initialize the underlying FreeType library.
trans-unit.target: 初始化底层FreeType库。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the pygame.midi module. Must be called before using the pygame.midi module.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 pygame.midi 模块。必须在使用 pygame.midi 模块之前被调用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the pygame display module. The display module cannot do anything until it is initialized. This is usually handled for you automatically when you call the higher level pygame.init().
trans-unit.target: 初始化pygame显示模块。显示模块在初始化之前无法执行任何操作。通常在调用更高级别的 pygame.init() 时自动为您处理。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the scrap module.
trans-unit.target: 初始化废品模块。

trans-unit.source: Input is used to get midi input from midi devices.
trans-unit.target: 输入用于从midi设备获得midi输入。

trans-unit.source: Is created with a floating point ratio, the instance is then intended to be passed as a collided callback function to the *collide functions.
trans-unit.target: 是以浮点比创建的,该实例然后打算作为碰撞回调函数传递给*碰撞函数。

trans-unit.source: Is created with a ratio, the instance is then intended to be passed as a collided callback function to the *collide functions.
trans-unit.target: 是用一个比值来创建的,然后该实例打算作为一个碰撞回调函数传递给*碰撞函数。

trans-unit.source: It can also be used to transfer pixels into a 'dest_surf' that match or don't match.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以用来将匹配或不匹配的像素转移到'dest_surf'中。

trans-unit.source: It initializes the joystick module. This will scan the system for all joystick devices. The module must be initialized before any other functions will work.
trans-unit.target: 它初始化操纵杆模块。这将扫描系统中所有的操纵杆设备。在任何其他功能工作之前,必须对模块进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: It is best to not always grab the input, since it prevents the user from doing other things on their system.
trans-unit.target: 最好不要总是抓取输入,因为这会妨碍用户在系统上做其他事情。

trans-unit.source: It is harmless to call this more than once, repeated calls have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 多打一次无妨,重复打没有效果。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have any number of subsurfaces and subsubsurfaces on the parent. It is also possible to subsurface the display Surface if the display mode is not hardware accelerated.
trans-unit.target: 在母体上可以有任意数量的子曲面和子子曲面。如果显示模式不是硬件加速,也可以将显示Surface子曲面化。

trans-unit.source: It is safe to call this init() more than once as repeated calls will have no effect. This is true even if you have pygame.quit() all the modules.
trans-unit.target: 多次调用此 init() 是安全的，因为重复调用将无效。即使您拥有 pygame.quit() 所有模块，也是如此。

trans-unit.source: It is safe to call this function even if font is currently not initialized.
trans-unit.target: 即使字体当前没有被初始化,调用这个函数也是安全的。

trans-unit.source: It is safe to call this function more than once.
trans-unit.target: 多次调用这个函数是安全的。

trans-unit.source: It is safe to call this more than once, but after the mixer is initialized you cannot change the playback arguments without first calling pygame.mixer.quit().
trans-unit.target: 可以多次调用此方法，但是初始化混合器之后，您必须先调用 pygame.mixer.quit() 才能更改播放参数。

trans-unit.source: It is safe to call this more than once.
trans-unit.target: 可以放心地多叫一次。

trans-unit.source: It is safe to create multiple CD objects for the same drive, they will all cooperate normally.
trans-unit.target: 为同一驱动器创建多个 CD 对象是安全的，它们都将正常协作。

trans-unit.source: It is safe to nest locking and unlocking calls. The surface will only be unlocked after the final lock is released.
trans-unit.target: 它是安全的巢锁和解锁的呼叫。只有在最后的锁被释放后,表面才会被解锁。

trans-unit.source: It is usually best to not pass the depth argument. It will default to the best and fastest color depth for the system. If your game requires a specific color format you can control the depth with this argument. Pygame will emulate an unavailable color depth which can be slow.
trans-unit.target: 通常最好不要传递深度参数。它将默认为系统的最佳和最快的颜色深度。如果你的游戏需要特定的颜色格式,你可以用这个参数来控制颜色深度。Pygame会模拟一个不可用的颜色深度,这可能会很慢。

trans-unit.source: It uses a simple weighted Euclidean distance formula to calculate the distance between the colors. The distance space ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 and is used as threshold for the color detection. This causes the comparison to mark pixels with a similar, but not exactly identical color, as black.
trans-unit.target: 它使用一个简单的加权欧氏距离公式来计算颜色之间的距离。距离空间的范围是0.0到1.0,并被用作颜色检测的阈值。这将导致比较将颜色相似但不完全相同的像素标记为黑色。

trans-unit.source: It uses a simple weighted Euclidean distance formula to calculate the distance between the colors. The distance space ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 and is used as threshold for the color detection. This causes the extraction to take pixels with a similar, but not exactly identical color, into account as well.
trans-unit.target: 它使用一个简单的加权欧氏距离公式来计算颜色之间的距离。距离空间的范围是0.0到1.0,并被用作颜色检测的阈值。这使得提取时也会考虑到颜色相似但不完全相同的像素。

trans-unit.source: It uses a simple weighted Euclidean distance formula to calculate the distance between the colors. The distance space ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 and is used as threshold for the color detection. This causes the replacement to take pixels with a similar, but not exactly identical color, into account as well.
trans-unit.target: 它使用一个简单的加权欧氏距离公式来计算颜色之间的距离。距离空间的范围是0.0到1.0,并被用作颜色检测的阈值。这使得替换时也会考虑到颜色相似但不完全相同的像素。

trans-unit.source: It uses the dirty flag technique and is therefore faster than the pygame.sprite.RenderUpdates if you have many static sprites. It also switches automatically between dirty rect update and full screen drawing, so you do no have to worry what would be faster.
trans-unit.target: 它使用脏标志技术，因此如果您有很多静态子 pygame.sprite.RenderUpdates 则它比pygame.sprite.RenderUpdates更快。它还可以在脏矩形更新和全屏绘图之间自动切换，因此您不必担心会更快。

trans-unit.source: It uses the portmidi library. Is portable to which ever platforms portmidi supports (currently Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux).
trans-unit.target: 它使用portmidi库。可以移植到portmidi支持的任何平台上(目前是Windows、Mac OS X和Linux)。

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind the Surface.fill() method works just as well for drawing filled rectangles. In fact the Surface.fill() can be hardware accelerated on some platforms with both software and hardware display modes.
trans-unit.target: 请记住， Surface.fill() 方法对于绘制填充的矩形同样有效。实际上，在某些具有软件和硬件显示模式的平台上，可以对 Surface.fill() 进行硬件加速。

trans-unit.source: Keyword arguments:
trans-unit.target: 嵉论。

trans-unit.source: Lastly, this module contains several collision functions. These help find sprites inside multiple groups that have intersecting bounding rectangles. To find the collisions, the Sprites are required to have a Surface.rect attribute assigned.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该模块包含多个碰撞功能。这些帮助在具有相交边界矩形的多个组中查找子画面。若要查找碰撞，需要为 Surface.rect 分配一个Surface.rect属性。

trans-unit.source: LayeredDirty group is for DirtySprite objects. Subclasses LayeredUpdates.
trans-unit.target: LayeredDirty组是针对DirtySprite对象的。LayeredUpdates的子类。

trans-unit.source: LayeredUpdates is a sprite group that handles layers and draws like OrderedUpdates.
trans-unit.target: LayeredUpdates是一个精灵组,它像OrderedUpdates一样处理图层和绘制。

trans-unit.source: Lets you get or set multiple coordinates as one attribute, eg vec.xyz = 1, 2, 3.
trans-unit.target: 可让您获取或设置多个坐标作为一个属性，例如 vec.xyz = 1, 2, 3 。

trans-unit.source: Licensed under the GNU LGPL License version 2.1.
trans-unit.target: 根据GNU LGPL License 2.1版本授权。

trans-unit.source: Like render() but with the pixels returned as a byte string of 8-bit gray-scale values. The foreground color is 255, the background 0, useful as an alpha mask for a foreground pattern.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 render() ,但像素以8位灰度值的字节字符串形式返回。前景色为255，背景为0，用作前景色的Alpha蒙版。

trans-unit.source: Like the testsprite.c that comes with SDL, this pygame version shows lots of sprites moving around.
trans-unit.target: 就像SDL附带的 testsprite.c 一样，这个pygame版本显示了很多精灵。

trans-unit.source: Load a music file for playback
trans-unit.target: 装入音乐文件进行播放

trans-unit.source: Load a new font from a given filename or a python file object. The size is the height of the font in pixels. If the filename is None the pygame default font will be loaded. If a font cannot be loaded from the arguments given an exception will be raised. Once the font is created the size cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 从给定的文件名或python文件对象中加载一个新的字体。大小是字体的高度,单位是像素。如果文件名为None,将加载pygame默认字体。如果不能从给定的参数中加载字体,将引发一个异常。一旦字体被创建,其大小就不能改变。

trans-unit.source: Load a new sound buffer from a filename, a python file object or a readable buffer object. Limited resampling will be performed to help the sample match the initialize arguments for the mixer. A Unicode string can only be a file pathname. A Python 2.x string or a Python 3.x bytes object can be either a pathname or a buffer object. Use the 'file' or 'buffer' keywords to avoid ambiguity; otherwise Sound may guess wrong. If the array keyword is used, the object is expected to export a version 3, C level array interface or, for Python 2.6 or later, a new buffer interface (The object is checked for a buffer interface first.)
trans-unit.target: 从文件名，python文件对象或可读缓冲区对象加载新的声音缓冲区。将执行有限的重采样以帮助样本匹配混合器的初始化参数。 Unicode字符串只能是文件路径名。 Python 2.x字符串或Python 3.x字节对象可以是路径名或缓冲区对象。使用'file'或'buffer'关键字以避免歧义；否则，声音可能会猜错。如果使用array关键字，则预期该对象将导出版本3， C 级数组接口，或者对于Python 2.6或更高版本，将导出新的缓冲区接口（首先检查该对象的缓冲区接口）。

trans-unit.source: Load an image from a file source. You can pass either a filename or a Python file-like object.
trans-unit.target: 从文件源加载图像。你可以传递一个文件名或一个Python文件类对象。

trans-unit.source: Loads a v4l2 camera. The device is typically something like "/dev/video0". Default width and height are 640 by 480. Format is the desired colorspace of the output. This is useful for computer vision purposes. The default is RGB. The following are supported:
trans-unit.target: 加载v4l2摄像机。该设备通常类似于“ / dev / video0”。默认的宽度和高度为640 x480。格式是输出所需的色彩空间。这对于计算机视觉目的很有用。默认值为 RGB 。支持以下内容：

trans-unit.source: Lock the pixel data of a Surface for access. On accelerated Surfaces, the pixel data may be stored in volatile video memory or nonlinear compressed forms. When a Surface is locked the pixel memory becomes available to access by regular software. Code that reads or writes pixel values will need the Surface to be locked.
trans-unit.target: 锁定一个Surface的像素数据,以便访问。在加速的Surface上,像素数据可能存储在易失性的视频存储器或非线性压缩形式。当一个Surface被锁定后,像素内存就可以被普通软件访问。读取或写入像素值的代码将需要锁定Surface。

trans-unit.source: Makes a duplicate copy of a Surface. The new surface will have the same pixel formats, color palettes, transparency settings, and class as the original. If a Surface subclass also needs to copy any instance specific attributes then it should override copy().
trans-unit.target: 制作Surface的副本。新表面将具有与原始表面相同的像素格式，调色板，透明度设置和类。如果Surface子类也需要复制任何实例特定的属性，则它应该重写 copy() 。

trans-unit.source: Manually uninitialize SDL_ttf's font system. This is called automatically by pygame.quit().
trans-unit.target: 手动取消初始化SDL_ttf的字体系统。这由 pygame.quit() 自动调用。

trans-unit.source: Many settings are the requested minimum. Creating a window with an OpenGL context will fail if OpenGL cannot provide the requested attribute, but it may for example give you a stencil buffer even if you request none, or it may give you a larger one than requested.
trans-unit.target: 许多设置都是要求的最小值。如果OpenGL不能提供所需的属性,那么创建一个带有OpenGL上下文的窗口将失败,但它可能会给您一个钢网缓冲区,即使您没有要求,或者它可能会给您一个比要求的更大的钢网缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Map a 3d array into a 2d array
trans-unit.target: 将一个三维数组映射到一个二维数组中

trans-unit.source: Map an array of color element values - (w, h, ..., 3) - to an array of pixels - (w, h) according to the format of <surface>.
trans-unit.target: 根据<surface>的格式将颜色元素值的数组-（w，h，...，3）映射到像素数组-（w，h）。

trans-unit.source: Mask
trans-unit.target: Mask

trans-unit.source: Minimum bit size of the depth buffer. Defaults to 16.
trans-unit.target: 深度缓冲区的最小位数。默认值为16。

trans-unit.source: Minimum bit size of the frame buffer. Defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 帧缓冲区的最小位数。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: Minimum bit size of the stencil buffer. Defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 模板缓冲区的最小位数。默认为0。

trans-unit.source: Module level tags control which modules are included in a unit test run. Tags are assigned to a unit test module with a corresponding <name>_tags.py module. The tags module has the global __tags__, a list of tag names. For example, cdrom_test.py has a tag file cdrom_tags.py containing a tags list that has the 'interactive' string. The 'interactive' tag indicates cdrom_test.py expects user input. It is excluded from a run_tests.py or pygame.tests.go run. Two other tags that are excluded are 'ignore' and 'subprocess_ignore'. These two tags indicate unit tests that will not run on a particular platform, or for which no corresponding pygame module is available. The test runner will list each excluded module along with the tag responsible.
trans-unit.target: 模块级别标签控制单元测试运行中包括哪些模块。标签通过相应的<name> _tags.py模块分配给单元测试模块。标签模块具有全局__tags__，即标签名称列表。例如， cdrom_test.py 的标签文件 cdrom_tags.py 包含带有“交互”字符串的标签列表。 “交互式”标签表示 cdrom_test.py 需要用户输入。它从 run_tests.py 或 pygame.tests.go 中排除跑。另外两个被排除的标签是“ ignore”和“ subprocess_ignore”。这两个标记表示将不会在特定平台上运行的单元测试，或者没有相应的pygame模块可用的单元测试。测试运行程序将列出每个排除的模块以及负责的标签。

trans-unit.source: Most of the functions accept a color argument that is an RGB triplet. These can also accept an RGBA quadruplet. The color argument can also be an integer pixel value that is already mapped to the Surface's pixel format.
trans-unit.target: 大多数函数接受 RGB 三元组的color参数。这些也可以接受 RGBA 四联体。color参数也可以是已经映射到Surface像素格式的整数像素值。

trans-unit.source: Most of the functions take a width argument to represent the size of stroke (thickness) around the edge of the shape. If a width of 0 is passed the shape will be filled (solid).
trans-unit.target: 大多数函数都取一个宽度参数来表示形状边缘的冲程大小(厚度)。如果传递宽度为0,形状将被填充(实心)。

trans-unit.source: Most of the work done with fonts are done by using the actual Font objects. The module by itself only has routines to initialize the module and create Font objects with pygame.font.Font().
trans-unit.target: 使用字体完成的大多数工作都是通过使用实际的Font对象完成的。模块本身只有例程，可以使用 pygame.font.Font() 初始化模块并创建Font对象。

trans-unit.source: Most work on fonts is done using Font instances. The module itself only has routines for initialization and creation of Font objects. You can load fonts from the system using the SysFont() function.
trans-unit.target: 关于字体的大多数工作都是使用 Font 实例完成的。模块本身只有用于初始化和创建 Font 对象的例程。您可以使用 SysFont() 函数从系统加载字体。

trans-unit.source: Move the image by dx pixels right and dy pixels down. dx and dy may be negative for left and up scrolls respectively. Areas of the surface that are not overwritten retain their original pixel values. Scrolling is contained by the Surface clip area. It is safe to have dx and dy values that exceed the surface size.
trans-unit.target: 向右移动 dx 像素,向下移动 dy 像素,向左和向上滚动时 dx 和 dy 可以分别为负值。未被覆盖的曲面区域保留其原始像素值。滚动是由Surface clip区域包含的。dx和dy的值超过曲面大小是安全的。

trans-unit.source: Moves the sprite to the bottom layer, moving it behind all other layers and adding one additional layer.
trans-unit.target: 将精灵移动到最底层,将其移动到所有其他图层的后面,并增加一个额外的图层。

trans-unit.source: Multiple coordinates can be set using slices or swizzling:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用切片或刷卡设置多个坐标。

trans-unit.source: New in pygame 1.9.2: The Rect class can be subclassed. Methods such as copy() and move() will recognize this and return instances of the subclass. However, the subclass's __init__() method is not called, and __new__() is assumed to take no arguments. So these methods should be overridden if any extra attributes need to be copied.
trans-unit.target: pygame 1.9.2中的新增功能：Rect类可以被子类化。诸如 copy() 和 move() 之类的方法将识别出这一点并返回子类的实例。但是，不会调用子类的 __init__() 方法，并且假定 __new__() 不带任何参数。因此，如果需要复制任何其他属性，则应覆盖这些方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that pygame does not automatically import pygame.gfxdraw, so you need to import pygame.gfxdraw before using it.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,pygame不会自动导入pygame.gfxdraw,所以在使用前需要导入pygame.gfxdraw。

trans-unit.source: Note that the Font class does not automatically determine script orientation. Vertical layout must be selected explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， Font 类不会自动确定脚本方向。垂直布局必须明确选择。

trans-unit.source: Note that the freetype module depends on the FreeType 2 library. It will not compile with the original FreeType 1.0. Hence, the first element of the tuple will always be "2".
trans-unit.target: 请注意， freetype 模块取决于FreeType 2库。它不会与原始的FreeType 1.0一起编译。因此，元组的第一个元素将始终为“ 2”。

trans-unit.source: Note that there is no Image class; an image is loaded as a Surface object. The Surface class allows manipulation (drawing lines, setting pixels, capturing regions, etc.).
trans-unit.target: 请注意,没有Image类,图像是作为Surface对象加载的。Surface类可以进行操作(画线、设置像素、捕捉区域等)。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function uses pygame.time.delay(), which uses lots of CPU in a busy loop to make sure that timing is more accurate.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此函数使用 pygame.time.delay() ，它在繁忙循环中使用大量CPU以确保计时更准确。

trans-unit.source: Note that this function uses SDL_Delay function which is not accurate on every platform, but does not use much CPU. Use tick_busy_loop if you want an accurate timer, and don't mind chewing CPU.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,这个函数使用SDL_Delay函数,虽然在每个平台上都不准确,但并不会占用太多的CPU。如果你想要一个精确的定时器,并且不介意浪费CPU,就用tick_busy_loop。

trans-unit.source: Note, remember to call pygame.event.get() before this function. Otherwise it will not work.
trans-unit.target: 注意，请记住在此函数之前调用 pygame.event.get() 。否则它将无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Note, that on X11 some X servers use middle button emulation. When you click both buttons 1 and 3 at the same time a 2 button event can be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在 X11 上,某些X服务器使用中间按钮仿真。当您同时单击按钮1和3时，会发出2按钮事件。

trans-unit.target: 注意,如果要获得所有的鼠标事件,最好使用以下两种方法之一

trans-unit.target: 注意，音轨0是 CD 上的第一音轨。曲目号从零开始。

trans-unit.source: Note: The buffer will be copied internally, no data will be shared between it and the Sound object.
trans-unit.target: 注意:缓冲区将被内部复制,它和声音对象之间不会共享数据。

trans-unit.source: Note: under MS Windows, the window that has the mouse focus also has the keyboard focus. But under X-Windows, one window can receive mouse events and another receive keyboard events. pygame.mouse.get_focused() indicates whether the pygame window receives mouse events.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在 MS Windows 下，具有鼠标焦点的窗口也具有键盘焦点。但是在X-Windows下，一个窗口可以接收鼠标事件，另一个窗口可以接收键盘事件。 pygame.mouse.get_focused() 指示pygame窗口是否接收到鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: On MacOSX when a file is opened using a pygame application, a USEREVENT with its code attribute set to pygame.USEREVENT_DROPFILE is generated. There is an additional attribute called filename where the name of the file being accessed is stored.
trans-unit.target: 在MacOSX上，使用pygame应用程序打开文件时，将 USEREVENT 一个USEREVENT，其 code 属性设置为 pygame.USEREVENT_DROPFILE 。还有一个名为 filename 的附加属性，用于存储要访问的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: On a PC the user can specify a default device by setting an environment variable. To use device #1, for example:
trans-unit.target: 在PC上,用户可以通过设置一个环境变量来指定一个默认设备。例如,要使用设备#1。

trans-unit.source: On each OS and version of Python the location will be slightly different. For example on Windows it might be in 'C:/Python26/Lib/site-packages/pygame/examples/' On Mac OS X it might be in '/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.6/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pygame/examples/'
trans-unit.target: 在每个操作系统和 Python 版本上,位置会略有不同。例如在 Windows 上,它可能在 'C:/Python26/Lib/site-packages/pygame/examples/' 在 Mac OS X 上,它可能在 '/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.6/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pygame/examples/' 中。

trans-unit.source: On high resolution displays(4k, 1080p) and tiny graphics games (640x480) show up very small so that they are unplayable. SCALED scales up the window for you. The game thinks it's a 640x480 window, but really it can be bigger. Mouse events are scaled for you, so your game doesn't need to do it.
trans-unit.target: 在高分辨率显示器上(4k,1080p)和微小的图形游戏(640x480)显示非常小,因此它们无法播放。SCALED可以为你放大窗口。游戏认为这是一个640x480的窗口,但实际上它可以更大。鼠标事件是为你缩放的,所以你的游戏不需要这样做。

trans-unit.source: On some platforms it is possible to embed the pygame display into an already existing window. To do this, the environment variable SDL_WINDOWID must be set to a string containing the window id or handle. The environment variable is checked when the pygame display is initialized. Be aware that there can be many strange side effects when running in an embedded display.
trans-unit.target: 在某些平台上，可以将pygame显示内容嵌入到现有窗口中。为此，必须将环境变量 SDL_WINDOWID 设置为包含窗口ID或句柄的字符串。初始化pygame显示时，将检查环境变量。请注意，在嵌入式显示器中运行时可能会有许多奇怪的副作用。

trans-unit.source: Once the display Surface is created, the functions from this module affect the single existing display. The Surface becomes invalid if the module is uninitialized. If a new display mode is set, the existing Surface will automatically switch to operate on the new display.
trans-unit.target: 一旦创建了显示器Surface,这个模块的功能就会影响到现有的单个显示器。如果该模块未被初始化,Surface就会失效。如果设置了新的显示模式,现有的Surface将自动切换到新的显示器上操作。

trans-unit.source: Only scalable (outline) fonts can be rotated. An attempt to change the rotation of a bitmap font raises an AttributeError. An attempt to change the rotation of an inactive font instance, as returned by Font.__new__(), raises a RuntimeError.
trans-unit.target: 只能旋转可缩放（轮廓）字体。尝试更改位图字体的旋转会引发AttributeError。尝试更改由 Font.__new__() 返回的不活动字体实例的旋转会引发RuntimeError。

trans-unit.source: Opens the camera device, attempts to initialize it, and begins recording images to a buffer. The camera must be started before any of the below functions can be used.
trans-unit.target: 打开摄像机设备,尝试初始化它,并开始记录图像到缓冲区。在使用以下任何功能之前,必须先启动摄像机。

trans-unit.source: Optimization: if you know that the final destination for the text (on the screen) will always have a solid background, and the text is antialiased, you can improve performance by specifying the background color. This will cause the resulting image to maintain transparency information by colorkey rather than (much less efficient) alpha values.
trans-unit.target: 优化:如果你知道文本的最终目的地(在屏幕上)总是有一个纯背景,而且文本是反锯齿的,你可以通过指定背景色来提高性能。这将导致生成的图像通过colorkey而不是(效率低得多的)alpha值来保持透明度信息。

trans-unit.source: Optional fgcolor, style, rotation, and size arguments override the default values set for the Font instance.
trans-unit.target: 可选的fgcolor，style，rotation和size参数将覆盖为 Font 实例设置的默认值。

trans-unit.target: 可选数据字段： write([[[0xc0, 0, 0], 20000]]) 等同于 write([[[0xc0], 20000]])

trans-unit.target: 可选地，文本可以是 None ，它将呈现传递到先前的 get_rect() ， render() ， render_to() ， render_raw() 或 render_raw_to() 调用的文本。有关详细信息，请参见 render_to() 。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, text can be set None, which will re-render text passed to a previous render_to(), get_rect(), render(), render_raw(), or render_raw_to() call. Primarily, this feature is an aid to using render_to() in combination with get_rect(). An example:
trans-unit.target: （可选）可以将文本设置为 None ，它将重新渲染传递到先前的 render_to() ， get_rect() ， render() ， render_raw() 或 render_raw_to() 调用的文本。首先，此功能有助于将 render_to() 与 get_rect() 结合使用。一个例子：

trans-unit.source: Optionally, a size argument may be specified to set the default size in points, which determines the size of the rendered characters. The size can also be passed explicitly to each method call. Because of the way the caching system works, specifying a default size on the constructor doesn't imply a performance gain over manually passing the size on each function call. If the font is bitmap and no size is given, the default size is set to the first available size for the font.
trans-unit.target: 可选地，可以指定大小参数以设置默认大小（以磅为单位），该大小确定渲染字符的大小。大小也可以显式传递给每个方法调用。由于缓存系统的工作方式，在构造函数上指定默认大小并不意味着相对于在每个函数调用中手动传递大小要获得性能上的提高。如果字体是位图并且没有给出大小，则默认大小将设置为该字体的第一个可用大小。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you may specify a default cache_size for the Glyph cache: the maximum number of glyphs that will be cached at any given time by the module. Exceedingly small values will be automatically tuned for performance. Also a default pixel resolution, in dots per inch, can be given to adjust font scaling.
trans-unit.target: （可选）您可以为字形缓存指定默认的cache_size：模块在任何给定时间将要缓存的字形的最大数量。极小的值将自动调整以提高性能。还可以提供默认像素分辨率（以每英寸点数为单位）来调整字体缩放。

trans-unit.source: Output MIDI information of 3 bytes or less. The data fields are optional and assumed to be 0 if omitted.
trans-unit.target: 输出3字节或更小的MIDI信息。的 data 字段是可选的，并假定为0，如果删去。

trans-unit.source: Per pixel alphas are different because they store a transparency value for every pixel. This allows for the most precise transparency effects, but it also the slowest. Per pixel alphas cannot be mixed with surface alpha and colorkeys.

trans-unit.source: Pygame
trans-unit.target: Pygame

trans-unit.source: Pygame can only have a single display active at any time. Creating a new one with pygame.display.set_mode() will close the previous display. If precise control is needed over the pixel format or display resolutions, use the functions pygame.display.mode_ok(), pygame.display.list_modes(), and pygame.display.Info() to query information about the display.
trans-unit.target: Pygame在任何时候都只能激活一个显示器。使用 pygame.display.set_mode() 创建一个新显示器将关闭前一个显示器。如果需要精确控制像素格式或显示分辨率，请使用函数 pygame.display.mode_ok() ， pygame.display.list_modes() 和 pygame.display.Info() 来查询有关显示器的信息。

trans-unit.source: Pygame chooses one of many available display backends when it is initialized. This returns the internal name used for the display backend. This can be used to provide limited information about what display capabilities might be accelerated. See the SDL_VIDEODRIVER flags in pygame.display.set_mode() to see some of the common options.
trans-unit.target: Pygame在初始化时会从众多可用的显示后端中选择一个。这将返回用于显示后端的内部名称。这可以用于提供有关可以加速哪些显示功能的有限信息。请参阅 pygame.display.set_mode() 中的 SDL_VIDEODRIVER 标志以查看一些常用选项。

trans-unit.source: Pygame comes with a built-in default font. This can always be accessed by passing None as the font name to the Font constructor.
trans-unit.target: Pygame带有内置的默认字体。始终可以通过将None作为字体名称传递给 Font 构造函数来访问它。

trans-unit.source: Pygame comes with a builtin default font. This can always be accessed by passing None as the font name.
trans-unit.target: Pygame有一个内置的默认字体。可以通过传递None作为字体名来访问。

trans-unit.source: Pygame currently supports only Linux and v4l2 cameras.
trans-unit.target: Pygame目前只支持Linux和v4l2摄像机。

trans-unit.source: Pygame handles all its event messaging through an event queue. The routines in this module help you manage that event queue. The input queue is heavily dependent on the pygame.display module. If the display has not been initialized and a video mode not set, the event queue may not work properly. The event subsystem should be called from the main thread. If you want to post events into the queue from other threads, please use the pygame.fastevent module.
trans-unit.target: Pygame通过事件队列处理所有事件消息。此模块中的例程可帮助您管理该事件队列。输入队列在很大程度上取决于 pygame.display 模块。如果尚未初始化显示并且未设置视频模式，则事件队列可能无法正常工作。事件子系统应从主线程调用。如果要从其他线程将事件发布到队列中，请使用 pygame.fastevent 模块。

trans-unit.source: Pygame may not always be built to support all image formats. At minimum it will support uncompressed BMP. If pygame.image.get_extended() returns 'True', you should be able to load most images (including PNG, JPG and GIF).
trans-unit.target: Pygame可能并不总是构建为支持所有图像格式。至少它将支持未压缩的 BMP 。如果 pygame.image.get_extended() 返回“ True”，则您应该能够加载大多数图像（包括PNG，JPG和GIF）。

trans-unit.source: Pygame module for interacting with joysticks, gamepads, and trackballs.
trans-unit.target: Pygame模块,用于与操纵杆、游戏板和轨迹球互动。

trans-unit.source: Pygame offers control over the system hardware cursor. Pygame only supports black and white cursors for the system. You control the cursor with functions inside pygame.mouse.
trans-unit.target: Pygame提供了对系统硬件光标的控制。Pygame仅支持该系统的黑白光标。您可以使用 pygame.mouse 中的函数控制光标。

trans-unit.source: Pygame unit test suite package
trans-unit.target: Pygame单元测试套件包

trans-unit.source: Pygame uses Rect objects to store and manipulate rectangular areas. A Rect can be created from a combination of left, top, width, and height values. Rects can also be created from python objects that are already a Rect or have an attribute named "rect".
trans-unit.target: Pygame 使用 Rect 对象来存储和操作矩形区域。一个Rect可以由左、顶、宽、高的组合来创建,也可以由已经是Rect的python对象或有 "rect "属性的对象来创建。矩形也可以由已经是矩形或有 "rect "属性的python对象创建。

trans-unit.source: Pygame will automatically determine the image type (e.g., GIF or bitmap) and create a new Surface object from the data. In some cases it will need to know the file extension (e.g., GIF images should end in ".gif"). If you pass a raw file-like object, you may also want to pass the original filename as the namehint argument.
trans-unit.target: Pygame将自动确定图像类型（例如， GIF 或位图），并根据数据创建一个新的Surface对象。在某些情况下，它将需要知道文件扩展名（例如， GIF 图像应以“ .gif”结尾）。如果传递类似原始文件的对象，则可能还需要传递原始文件名作为namehint参数。

trans-unit.source: Pygame will select from one of several internal display backends when it is initialized. The display mode will be chosen depending on the platform and permissions of current user. Before the display module is initialized the environment variable SDL_VIDEODRIVER can be set to control which backend is used. The systems with multiple choices are listed here.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，Pygame将从多个内部显示后端之一中进行选择。将根据当前用户的平台和权限来选择显示模式。在初始化显示模块之前，可以将环境变量 SDL_VIDEODRIVER 设置为控制使用哪个后端。此处列出了具有多种选择的系统。

See render_to(). As with the other render methods, text can be None to render a text string passed previously to another method.

trans-unit.source: Renders the string text to the pygame.Surfacesurf, at position dest, a (x, y) surface coordinate pair. If either x or y is not an integer it is converted to one if possible. Any sequence where the first two items are x and y positional elements is accepted, including a Rect instance. As with render(), optional fgcolor, style, rotation, and size argument are available.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串文本渲染到 pygame.Surface surf，在位置dest处，是一个（x，y）表面坐标对。如果x或y不是整数，则在可能的情况下将其转换为1。可以接受前两个元素分别是x和y位置元素的任何序列，包括 Rect 实例。与 render() 一样，可选的fgcolor，style，rotation和size参数也可用。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the passed color in the PixelArray with another one.
trans-unit.target: 用另一种颜色替换PixelArray中传递的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the pixels with the passed color in the PixelArray by changing them them to the passed replacement color.
trans-unit.target: 通过将像素数组中传递的颜色替换为传递的替换颜色来替换像素。

trans-unit.source: Request an OpenGL display attribute for the display mode
trans-unit.target: 为显示模式申请一个OpenGL显示属性。

trans-unit.source: Request the window for the display surface be iconified or hidden. Not all systems and displays support an iconified display. The function will return True if successful.
trans-unit.target: 要求将显示面的窗口图标化或隐藏。并非所有系统和显示器都支持图标化显示。如果成功,该函数将返回True。

trans-unit.source: Reserves a pygame.USEREVENT for a custom use.
trans-unit.target: 保留 pygame.USEREVENT 供自定义使用。

trans-unit.source: Resets playback of the current music to the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 将当前音乐的播放重设为开头。

trans-unit.source: Resizes a mask
trans-unit.target: 调整掩模大小

trans-unit.source: Resizes the Surface to a new resolution. This is a fast scale operation that does not sample the results.
trans-unit.target: 将曲面调整为新的分辨率。这是一个不对结果进行采样的快速缩放操作。

trans-unit.source: Resources such as images and sounds for the examples are found in the pygame/examples/data subdirectory.
trans-unit.target: 例子的图片和声音等资源可以在pygame/examples/data子目录下找到。

trans-unit.source: Resume the playback on a paused channel.
trans-unit.target: 在暂停的通道上恢复播放。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the data for the specified type from the clipboard. In python 3 the data is returned as a byte string and might need further processing (such as decoding to Unicode).
trans-unit.target: 从剪贴板中获取指定类型的数据。在python 3中,数据以字节串的形式返回,可能需要进一步的处理(如解码为Unicode)。

trans-unit.source: Return False if there is a cdrom currently in the drive. If the drive is empty this will return True.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前硬盘中有CDROM,则返回False。如果驱动器是空的,将返回True。

trans-unit.source: Return True if the Group contains all of the given sprites. This is similar to using the "in" operator on the Group ("if sprite in group: ..."), which tests if a single Sprite belongs to a Group.
trans-unit.target: 如果Group包含所有给定的Sprite,返回True。这类似于在Group上使用 "in "操作符("if sprite in group:..."),测试单个Sprite是否属于一个Group。

trans-unit.source: Return True when the font bold rendering mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 启用字体粗体渲染模式时返回True。

trans-unit.source: Return True when the font italic rendering mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 启用字体斜体渲染模式时返回True。

trans-unit.source: Return True when the font underline is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 启用字体下划线时返回True。

trans-unit.source: Return a Channel object for one of the current channels. The id must be a value from 0 to the value of pygame.mixer.get_num_channels().
trans-unit.target: 返回当前通道之一的Channel对象。id必须是从0到 pygame.mixer.get_num_channels() 的值。

trans-unit.source: Return a buffer object for the pixels of the Surface. The buffer can be used for direct pixel access and manipulation. Surface pixel data is represented as an unstructured block of memory, with a start address and length in bytes. The data need not be contiguous. Any gaps are included in the length, but otherwise ignored.
trans-unit.target: 返回Surface像素的缓冲区对象。缓冲区可以用来直接访问和操作像素。Surface像素数据是以一个非结构化的内存块来表示的,其起始地址和长度以字节为单位。数据不需要是连续的。任何空隙都包含在长度中,但在其他方面可以忽略。

trans-unit.source: Return a copy of the RGBA Color value at the given pixel. If the Surface has no per pixel alpha, then the alpha value will always be 255 (opaque). If the pixel position is outside the area of the Surface an IndexError exception will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定像素的 RGBA 颜色值的副本。如果Surface没有每个像素的Alpha，则Alpha值将始终为255（不透明）。如果像素位置在Surface区域之外，则会引发 IndexError 异常。

trans-unit.source: Return a copy of the Sound object buffer as a bytes (for Python 3.x) or str (for Python 2.x) object.
trans-unit.target: 返回声音对象缓冲区的一个字节(对于Python 3.x)或str(对于Python 2.x)对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: Return a description of the last error which occurred in the FreeType2 library, or None if no errors have occurred.
trans-unit.target: 返回在FreeType2库中发生的最后一个错误的描述,如果没有错误发生,则返回None。

trans-unit.source: Return a dict for the finger index active on touchid. The dict contains these keys:
trans-unit.target: 返回对 touchid 上活动的手指 index 字典。该字典包含以下键：

trans-unit.source: Return a floating point value in seconds of the length of the cdrom track.
trans-unit.target: 返回CDROM轨道长度的浮点数,单位为秒。

trans-unit.source: Return a list containing all Sprites in a Group that intersect with another Sprite. Intersection is determined by comparing the Sprite.rect attribute of each Sprite.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列表，其中包含一个组中与另一个Sprite相交的所有Sprite。交叉点是通过比较每个Sprite 的 Sprite.rect 属性确定的。

trans-unit.source: Return a list of all the Groups that contain this Sprite.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含该Sprite的所有Group的列表。

trans-unit.source: Return a list of all the Sprites this group contains. You can also get an iterator from the group, but you cannot iterator over a Group while modifying it.
trans-unit.target: 返回这个组包含的所有Sprites的列表。你也可以从该组中获取迭代器,但你不能在修改组时对其进行迭代。

trans-unit.source: Return a list of up to 256 color elements that represent the indexed colors used in an 8-bit Surface. The returned list is a copy of the palette, and changes will have no effect on the Surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回最多256个颜色元素的列表,这些颜色元素代表8位Surface中使用的索引颜色。返回的列表是调色板的副本,更改后不会对Surface产生影响。

trans-unit.source: Return a list with information for every track on the cdrom. The information consists of a tuple with four values. The audio value is True if the track contains audio data. The start, end, and length values are floating point numbers in seconds. Start and end represent absolute times on the entire disc.
trans-unit.target: 返回CDROM中每条轨道的信息列表。这些信息由一个包含四个值的元组组成。如果该轨道包含音频数据,则音频值为True。start、end和length值是以秒为单位的浮点数。开始和结束代表整个光盘的绝对时间。

trans-unit.source: Return a new Font object that is loaded from the system fonts. The font will match the requested bold and italic flags. If a suitable system font is not found, a default, Pygame, is returned instead. The font name can be a comma separated list of font names to search for.
trans-unit.target: 返回从系统字体加载的新Font对象。字体将与请求的粗体和斜体标志匹配。如果找不到合适的系统字体，则返回默认值Pygame。字体名称可以是要搜索的以逗号分隔的字体名称列表。

trans-unit.source: Return a new Font object that is loaded from the system fonts. The font will match the requested bold and italic flags. If a suitable system font is not found this will fall back on loading the default pygame font. The font name can be a comma separated list of font names to look for.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个从系统字体中加载的新字体对象。字体将与要求的粗体和斜体标志相匹配。如果没有找到合适的系统字体,将返回加载默认的pygame字体。字体名称可以是一个逗号分隔的字体名称列表。

trans-unit.source: Return a rectangle of the current clipping area. The Surface will always return a valid rectangle that will never be outside the bounds of the image. If the Surface has had None set for the clipping area, the Surface will return a rectangle with the full area of the Surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前剪切区域的矩形。Surface将始终返回一个永远不会超出图像范围的有效矩形。如果为Surface 的修剪区域设置了“ None ，则Surface将返回一个矩形，其中包含Surface的整个区域。

trans-unit.source: Return a reference to the currently set display Surface. If no display mode has been set this will return None.
trans-unit.target: 返回对当前设置的显示模式Surface的引用。如果没有设置显示模式,则返回None。

trans-unit.source: Return a value from 0.0 to 1.0 representing the volume for this Sound.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个从0.0到1.0的值,代表这个声音的音量。

trans-unit.source: Return an integer id associated with the given index.
trans-unit.target: 返回与给定 index 关联的整数id 。

trans-unit.source: Return an object which exports a surface's internal pixel buffer as a C level array struct, Python level array interface or a C level buffer interface. The pixel buffer is writeable. The new buffer protocol is supported for Python 2.6 and up in CPython. The old buffer protocol is also supported for Python 2.x. The old buffer data is in one segment for kind '0', multi-segment for other buffer view kinds.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象,该对象将曲面的内部像素缓冲区输出为 C 级数组结构、Python 级数组接口或 C 级缓冲区接口。像素缓冲区是可写的。新的缓冲区协议在CPython中支持Python 2.6及以上版本。旧的缓冲区协议也支持Python 2.x。旧的缓冲区数据对于'0'类是一段,对于其他缓冲区视图类是多段。

trans-unit.source: Return rendered text as a string of bytes
trans-unit.target: 将渲染后的文本作为一串字节返回。

trans-unit.source: Return rendered text as a surface
trans-unit.target: 将渲染后的文本作为曲面返回

trans-unit.source: Return the FreeType version
trans-unit.target: 返回FreeType版本

trans-unit.source: Return the absolute time in seconds where at start of the cdrom track.
trans-unit.target: 返回CDROM轨道开始时的绝对时间(秒)。

trans-unit.source: Return the actual Sound object currently playing on this channel. If the channel is idle None is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前在此通道上播放的实际Sound对象。如果通道空闲， None 返回任何内容。

trans-unit.source: Return the current alpha value for the Surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回Surface的当前alpha值。

trans-unit.source: Return the current colorkey value for the Surface. If the colorkey is not set then None is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回Surface的当前colorkey值。如果未设置色键，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: Return the default device ID or -1 if there are no devices. The result can be passed to the Input/Output class.
trans-unit.target: 返回默认设备ID；如果没有设备，则返回 -1 。结果可以传递到 Input / Output 类。

trans-unit.source: Return the default pixel size in dots per inch
trans-unit.target: 返回默认的像素大小,单位为每英寸点。

trans-unit.source: Return the filename of the default pygame font. This is not the full path to the file. The file is usually in the same directory as the font module, but can also be bundled in a separate archive.
trans-unit.target: 返回默认pygame字体的文件名。这不是文件的完整路径。该文件通常与字体模块在同一目录下,但也可以捆绑在一个单独的档案中。

trans-unit.source: Return the filename of the system font. This is not the full path to the file. This file can usually be found in the same directory as the font module, but it can also be bundled in separate archives.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统字体的文件名。这不是文件的完整路径。这个文件通常可以在字体模块的同一目录下找到,但也可以捆绑在单独的档案中。

trans-unit.source: Return the glyph bounding box height of the font in pixels. This is the average value of all glyphs in the font. It is not adjusted for strong or rotation.
trans-unit.target: 返回字体的字形边界框高度,单位为像素。这是字体中所有字形的平均值。它不因强弱或旋转而调整。

trans-unit.source: Return the glyph case size
trans-unit.target: 返回字形大小

trans-unit.source: Return the glyph metrics for the given text
trans-unit.target: 返回给定文本的字形度量。

trans-unit.source: Return the height in pixels for a line of text with the font. When rendering multiple lines of text this is the recommended amount of space between lines.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有字体的一行文字的高度,单位为像素。当渲染多行文字时,建议在行与行之间留出一定的空间。

trans-unit.source: Return the height in pixels for the font ascent. The ascent is the number of pixels from the font baseline to the top of the font.
trans-unit.target: 返回字体上升的高度,单位为像素。上升高度是指从字体基线到字体顶部的像素数。

trans-unit.source: Return the height in pixels for the font descent. The descent is the number of pixels from the font baseline to the bottom of the font.
trans-unit.target: 返回字体下降的高度,单位为像素。下降高度是指从字体基线到字体底部的像素数。

trans-unit.source: Return the height in pixels of the actual rendered text. This is the average size for each glyph in the font.
trans-unit.target: 返回实际渲染文本的高度,单位为像素。这是字体中每个字形的平均大小。

trans-unit.source: Return the height of the Surface in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 返回曲面的高度,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: Return the integer value of the given pixel. If the pixel position is outside the area of the Surface an IndexError exception will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定像素的整数值。如果像素位置在Surface区域之外，则会引发 IndexError 异常。

trans-unit.source: Return the latest FreeType error
trans-unit.target: 返回最新的FreeType错误

trans-unit.source: Return the least significant number of bits stripped from each color in a mapped integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回映射整数中每个颜色的最小有效位数。

trans-unit.source: Return the length of this Sound in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 返回此声音的长度,单位为秒。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of active channels this sound is playing on.
trans-unit.target: 返回该声音正在播放的活动通道数。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of available touch devices.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用触摸设备的数量。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of bytes separating each row in the Surface. Surfaces in video memory are not always linearly packed. Subsurfaces will also have a larger pitch than their real width.
trans-unit.target: 返回Surface中每行之间的字节数。视频存储器中的曲面并不总是线性填充的。子表面的间距也会比实际宽度大。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of bytes used per pixel.
trans-unit.target: 返回每个像素使用的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of cd drives on the system. When you create CD objects you need to pass an integer id that must be lower than this count. The count will be 0 if there are no drives on the system.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统上CD驱动器的数量。创建 CD 对象时，您需要传递一个整数ID，该ID必须小于此计数。如果系统上没有驱动器，则计数为0。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of displays
trans-unit.target: 返回显示次数

trans-unit.source: Return the number of fingers active for the touch device whose id is
trans-unit.target: 返回id为_的触摸设备的活动手指数。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of joystick devices on the system. The count will be 0 if there are no joysticks on the system.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统中操纵杆设备的数量,如果系统中没有操纵杆,则计数为0。如果系统中没有操纵杆,则计数为0。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of milliseconds since pygame.init() was called. Before pygame is initialized this will always be 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回自调用 pygame.init() 以来的毫秒数。在初始化pygame之前，该值始终为0。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of pixels from the font's baseline to the top of the bounding box. It is not adjusted for strong or rotation.
trans-unit.target: 返回从字体基线到边界框顶部的像素数。它不因强弱或旋转而调整。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of tracks on the cdrom in the drive. This will return zero of the drive is empty or has no tracks.
trans-unit.target: 返回驱动器中CDROM上的轨道数,如果驱动器为空或没有轨道,则返回0。如果硬盘是空的或者没有轨道,则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Return the number of units from the font's baseline to the top of the bounding box. It is not adjusted for strong or rotation.
trans-unit.target: 返回从字体基线到边界框顶部的单位数。它不因强弱或旋转而调整。

trans-unit.source: Return the size and offset of rendered text
trans-unit.target: 返回已渲染文本的大小和偏移量

trans-unit.source: Return the size of the window or screen
trans-unit.target: 返回窗口或屏幕的大小

trans-unit.source: Return the string name of the drive. This is the system name used to represent the drive. It is often the drive letter or device name. This method can work on an uninitialized CD.
trans-unit.target: 返回驱动器的字符串名称。这是用于表示驱动器的系统名称。通常是驱动器号或设备名称。此方法可以在未初始化的 CD 上工作。

trans-unit.source: Return the volume of the channel for the current playing sound. This does not take into account stereo separation used by Channel.set_volume(). The Sound object also has its own volume which is mixed with the channel.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前播放声音的声道音量。这没有考虑 Channel.set_volume() 使用的立体声分离。声音对象也有自己的音量，与通道混合。

trans-unit.source: Return the width and height of the Surface in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 返回曲面的宽度和高度,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: Return the width of the Surface in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 返回曲面的宽度,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: Return type:
trans-unit.target: 返回类型:

trans-unit.source: Return value:
trans-unit.target: 返回值:

trans-unit.source: Return wrapped exporting object.
trans-unit.target: 返回封装的导出对象。

trans-unit.source: Returning a list of Color(with length 3) instances instead of tuples.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 Color(with length 3) 实例列表，而不是元组。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if pygame is currently initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果pygame当前已初始化，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the pygame.freetype module is currently initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pygame.freetype 模块当前已初始化，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the Surface is required to be locked to access pixel data. Usually pure software Surfaces do not require locking. This method is rarely needed, since it is safe and quickest to just lock all Surfaces as needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要锁定Surface才能访问像素数据，则返回 True 。通常，纯软件Surfaces不需要锁定。很少需要这种方法，因为根据需要锁定所有Surface是安全，快捷的。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the channel is actively mixing sound. If the channel is idle this returns False.
trans-unit.target: 如果通道正在积极混合声音，则返回 True 。如果通道空闲，则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the given event type is blocked from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定事件类型被从队列中阻止，则返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the mixer is busy mixing any channels. If the mixer is idle then this return False.
trans-unit.target: 如果混音器正在忙于混合任何通道，则返回 True 。如果混音器空闲，则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if there are any events of the given type waiting on the queue. If a sequence of event types is passed, this will return True if any of those events are on the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果队列中有任何给定类型的事件等待，则返回 True 。如果传递了一系列事件类型，则如果这些事件中的任何一个在队列中，则它将返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the Surface is locked. It doesn't matter how many times the Surface is locked.
trans-unit.target: Surface锁定时返回 True 。Surface锁定多少次都没有关系。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the input events are grabbed for this application.
trans-unit.target: 当为此应用程序获取输入事件时，返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the pygame.display module is currently initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pygame.display 模块当前已初始化，则返回True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the init() method has already been called on this Joystick object.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经在此Joystick对象上调用了 init() 方法，则返回True 。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the FreeType module is currently initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果FreeType模块当前被初始化,返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the display module has been initialized
trans-unit.target: 如果显示模块已被初始化,返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the drive busy playing back audio.
trans-unit.target: 如果硬盘忙于播放音频,则返回True。
